title.native: エスカ＆ロジーのアトリエ ～黄昏の空の錬金術士～
title.romaji: Escha & Logy no Atelier: Tasogare no Sora no Renkinjutsushi
title.english: Atelier Escha & Logy ~Alchemists of the Dusk Sky~

description:
Escha Malier has always wanted to become an Alchemist and explore the ruins floating above her home town. Now she'll get her chance working in the R&D branch of the town's Alchemy department. However, she's not quite as ready for new coworker, Logy. They seem to be such total opposites! But as contaminants and pollution threaten the farmlands, they'll have to work together to seek out the causes. Because sometimes when one person alone can't save the world, two of them working in harmony can.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

node.description: Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/115874632) | [Website](leftside.info/index.html)

Hidari is a Japanese illustrator and character designer. He is primarily known as an illustrator for video games and light novels. Some of his notable designs for anime include [Fractale](https://anilist.co/anime/9314/) and [Natsuiro Kiseki](https://anilist.co/anime/12119/) and for PS3 game Atelier Ayesha, and best known light novel illustrations are for [Sasami-san@Ganbaranai](https://anilist.co/manga/69349/).

His pseudonym and circle "Left Side" comes from the fact that he predominantly uses his left hand.

He was awarded third place in the 2010 “Kono Light Novel ga Sugoi!” illustrator ranking.

__Notable works outside anime:__

- Atelier Ayesha: The Alchemist of Dusk (Video Game, 2012) (Character Illustration / Character Designing, Illustration)
- Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky (Video Game, 2014) (Character Illustration / Designing)
- Atelier Shallie: Alchemists of the Dusk Sea (Video Game, 2014) (Character Illustration / Character Designing)
- Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia (Video Game, 2017) (Character Design & Illustration)
- Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth (Video Game, 2020) (Character Drafts)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
Previously working at Tavac, now for Real-T.
**Masato Takahashi** is a Japanese CG director and CG designer who also does photography.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/OOTOTORO)

Shibata Tomonori is a producer and the representative director of Studio Gokumi. In the past, he worked for Trans Arts and Gonzo.

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)
Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.
